alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Randolph (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 10:46AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Randolph, western Lawrence and central Sharp Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1046 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Highland in Sharp County, or near Ash Flat, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Cherokee Village... Black Rock... Highland in Sharp County... Hardy... Imboden... Ravenden... Strawberry... Lynn... Ravenden Springs... Annieville... Evening Shade... Smithville... Williford... Center... Calamine... Poughkeepsie... Eaton... Birdell... Nelsonville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
